title: Coupling deep eutectic solvents with innovative extraction techniques towards plant derived bioactive compositions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00111G, Critical Review
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anastasia Kyriakoudi, Ivana Radojčić Redovniković, Senka Vidović, Kristina Radošević, Thanos Andreou, Ioannis Mourtzinos, Marina Cvjetko Bubalo
This review outlines the evolution, current status, and future trends in utilizing DESs as extraction solvents with innovative techniques to recover valuable compounds from natural sources for diverse laboratory and industrial applications.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
